prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with flowing tentacles and a mystical appearance.
Imagine a ghostly jellyfish Pokemon that haunts the depths of the ocean.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish but has a fierce battle style.
Show me an ethereal aquatic creature that glows in the dark underwater.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon with soft, pastel colors and a gentle demeanor.
Make a unique Pokemon that combines jellyfish characteristics with ghostly traits.
Give me a cute yet eerie Pokemon that floats gracefully through the water.
